          • setUseControlGroup

            public boolean setUseControlGroup(boolean useControlGroup)
            Sets whether control group are enabled. If set to false the control group are never visible and are disconnected from the player.
            Parameters:
            useControlGroup - Whether control group should be enabled.

          • setOrientationHelper

            public void setOrientationHelper(android.app.Activity activity,
                                 int order)
            After setOrientationHelper by getOrientationHelper().go...() change Orientation

            Notice: call onConfigurationChanged in your Activity 

             WARNING:

 1. Add configChanges in AndroidManifest.xml
  <activity
    android:configChanges="orientation|keyboardHidden|screenLayout|screenSize"
  </activity>

 2. Override method onConfigurationChanged in Activity
  @Override
  public void onConfigurationChanged(Configuration newConfig) {
    super.onConfigurationChanged(newConfig);
    //Dispose View
    if (newConfig.orientation == Configuration.ORIENTATION_LANDSCAPE) {
      xxx.setVisibility(View.GONE);
    } else if (newConfig.orientation == Configuration.ORIENTATION_PORTRAIT) {
      xxx.setVisibility(View.VISIBLE);
    }
  }
            Parameters:
            order -
            • 1: enable listen from Sensor orientation change
            • 2: disable listen from Sensor orientation change
            • 0: release

          • onConfigurationChanged

            public void onConfigurationChanged(android.content.res.Configuration newConfig)
            Overrides:
            onConfigurationChanged in class android.view.View
